features: 🎮Built-in 23 Retro Games: This wireless TV game console built in 23 selected games, is pre-install 9 emulators, and pack with 32GB TF card.

. 🎮 Dual 2.4GHz Wireless Controllers: Enjoy seamless wireless connectivity between the game controllers and joysticks, allowing two players to join in the fun. The retro video game console comes with two 2.4GHz wireless controllers, ensuring an immersive and hassle-free gaming experience.

🎮HDMI Output: Enjoy retro video games on a big TV screen by using the mini HDMI cable connected to the TV.No downloads or installations are required. Connect to your TV and indulge in a daily dose of gaming nostalgia.
🎮Simple Setup and Operation: Setting up the retro game stick is a breeze. Just connect it to the power supply, plug it into the TV, and switch the TV signal source to the HD channel.

🎮Unleash Nostalgia, Perfect Gift for All: This nostalgia-inducing game console isn't just for kids—it also brings back fond memories for adults born in the '80s and '90s, providing a much-needed break from the stress of daily life. Whether it's for a birthday or any occasion, this wireless game console makes an ideal gift for kids and adults alike.
body.description: The DOYO Retro Game Console - is a perfect blend of nostalgia and modern gaming technology. With its built-in 23 retro games, 9 pre-installed emulators, and a 32GB TF card, this console offers a treasure trove of classic gaming experiences. Immerse yourself in the world of timeless favorites like Super Mario Bros, Pac-Man, and Street Fighter. Equipped with dual 2.4GHz wireless controllers, the Retro Game Console ensures seamless connectivity and allows two players to join in the fun. Say goodbye to tangled wires and enjoy an immersive gaming experience with your friends or family. The ergonomic design of the controllers ensures comfortable gameplay for hours on end.Experience the thrill of playing retro video games on a big screen with the HDMI output feature. Simply connect the console to your TV using the included mini HDMI cable and indulge in a trip down memory lane. Relive the excitement and challenges of your favorite games in high definition, bringing back the magic of the past. Setting up the Retro Game Console is a breeze. Just connect it to the power supply, plug it into your TV, and switch the TV signal source to the HD channel. Within minutes, you'll be transported to a world of pixelated adventures and endless entertainment.This console isn't just for kids; it's a perfect gift for adults who grew up in the '80s and '90s. It provides a much-needed break from the stress of daily life and allows you to relive the golden age of gaming. Whether you're a seasoned gamer or a casual player, the Retro Game Console is sure to bring joy and nostalgia to your gaming sessions.In conclusion, the Retro Game Console offers a compact and convenient way to enjoy classic games from the past. With its extensive game library, wireless controllers, HDMI output, and easy setup, it's the ultimate gaming companion for retro enthusiasts. Unleash your inner child, embrace the nostalgia, and embark on a gaming journey like no oth

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars HORRIBLE WASTE OF MONEY, WHAT FEWS GAMES ARE ACTUALLY ON IT ARE SOOOO BADDD.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I was so looking goward to getting this, as I was a big gamer back in the atari 2600 days and this was supposed to have thousands of games on it. Unfortunately it you have to download them somehow. The games that were on there like 6 of them dont even work and the ones that do are so horrible that it is unbelievable. Once i plugged it in it looked promising as i show in the video, but then there is nothing on the memory stick but a few super, super bad games, horrible graphic and gameplay. This sytem is not only bad the buttons on the joystick does not work to well, they dont respond. The price at $59.99 would be great if the system worked well, and the games as well. It is not a good prouduct at all, and wish i never ordered, complete waste.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The best part of this unit - it works . The included games are no-name, super cheesy knock-offs of games we've never even seen before. Maybe the target audience was people in a different region of the world, but wow, They really are bad!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very retro feels when I plugged and used! Love how easy it is to use, only thing is that you need batteries. However, the wireless controls is such a better option than its rivaled wired control consoles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not worth any amount of money!
reviews.reviewText: I do not have a whole lot to say about this game console. When I read the description, it stated that there were more than 850 games included. When I set it up, I could get about 25 games. The graphics were minimal, and the gameplay was choppy. I am not a gaming expert, but my kids played a lot of games when they were young, so I know a little about what games they had. I did not recognize any of the titles of these games. I found a generic Tetris game, but after playing it one time, I was disappointed. The wireless controllers did work, but most of the buttons were useless.At first, I thought I had missed something when connecting and setting up this system. I sent a message to the seller asking for further instructions. I received a quick response that informed me that there were only a few games. They went on to say “This is the updated version which we avoid the patent issues,” and insisted that they are “high quality selected games” and apologized for the wrong product information on the listing. So there was not any help there.I had hoped to have this system set up and available for my grandchildren to play when they visit. I will have to continue to look for something because I will not get any use out of this game system. I do not recommend it to anyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’m not gonna try to sugar coat this - this is a really lame product. Probably one of the most disappointing experiences I’ve ever had reviewing stuff. It says nine emulators, and it looks to be PlayStation style controllers, plus it costs a pretty significant amount of money, so I had some decent hopes up that this would have some pretty awesome games on there. When it arrived, I excitedly hooked it up, but I immediately had to stop to go to the store to buy AAA batteries (the controllers need 3 batteries each, but they decided not to include them). I got back, installed the batteries, and I selected a category. I was SUPER bummed to realize that not only are there only maybe 20 games on this thing total, roughly 5 per category, but they were 8 bit NES games. And they are absolutely not any of the good ones. THE GAME SELECTIONS ARE SO AWFUL, seriously. They would have been much, much better off not including any games at all and just telling you to figure out how to put your own on there. It seems like they intentionally picked the most comically horrendous games they could find, just to have a laugh. Not even one game worth playing for even a couple of minutes. Not at all exaggerating. There was no reason to even include PlayStation style controllers with this, since all but two of the buttons would never be used. It would have been overpriced even if it were fun, but as it is, it’s completely absurd to think of spending 60 bucks on this. I don’t give one star ratings and scathing reviews often, but I would have given this one 0 stars if it were an option. They gave the lowest effort imaginable with the game selection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This is fun little retro game system to have loads of fun with!
reviews.reviewText: This is a fun easy to install retro game system that's fun for everyone. There's alot of fun games to try. I enjoy playing with my grandkids! Well made and makes a fun good gift!!#FoundItOnAmazon
